There is a <S%H1285>league<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you, as there was <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H25>father<s%> and your <S%H25>father:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> you <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold;<s%> <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> your <S%H1285>league<s%> with <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that he may <S%H5927>depart<s%> from me.

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and they <S%H5375>carried<s%> away the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and the <S%H6086>timber<s%> thereof, with <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> was <S%H1129>building;<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> therewith <S%H1387>Geba<s%> and <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

And at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Because you have <S%H8172>relied<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and not <S%H8172>relied<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> is the <S%H2428>host<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Were not the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> and the <S%H3864>Lubims<s%> a <S%H7230>huge<s%> <S%H2428>host,<s%> with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen?<s%> yet, because you did <S%H8172>rely<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

For the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7751>run<s%> to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> throughout the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> to show himself <S%H2388>strong<s%> in the <S%H5973>behalf<s%> of them whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> him. <S%H5921>Herein<s%> you have done <S%H5528>foolishly:<s%> therefore from now <S%H6258>on<s%> you shall <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H4421>wars.<s%>

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> was <S%H3707>wroth<s%> with the <S%H7200>seer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in a <S%H4115>prison<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> for he was in a <S%H2197>rage<s%> with him <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> thing. And <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> some of the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H609>Asa,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H2009>see,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H609>Asa<s%> in the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8672>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4438>reign<s%> was <S%H2470>diseased<s%> in his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> his <S%H2483>disease<s%> was <S%H4605>exceeding<s%> great: <S%H1571>yet<s%> in his <S%H2483>disease<s%> he <S%H1875>sought<s%> not to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> but to the <S%H7495>physicians.<s%>
And <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H6913>sepulchers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H3738>made<s%> for himself in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him in the <S%H4904>bed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H1314>odors<s%> and divers <S%H2177>kinds<s%> of spices <S%H7543>prepared<s%> by the <S%H4842>apothecaries'<s%> <S%H4639>are:<s%> and they made a <S%H5704>very<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8316>burning<s%> for him.
